title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: NEAR House - ETH Denver | Feb 26th - March 6th 2023 | Denver, ColoradoEvent Website: https://www.supermooncamp.com/event-details/near-house-ethdenver-by-supermoon-campIt's an 8 day experience that will gather devs and founders building on NEAR during ETH Denver.. You will be staying along with 15-18 builders and founders in a private house in Denver downtown during ETH Denver close to the main venue.

comments.author: S3cco
comments.body: The Ultimate Stay Together, Build Together Destination: NEAR House by Supermoon Camp https://bitcoingarden.org/the-ultimate-stay-together-build-together-destination-near-house-by-supermoon-camp/ The highly anticipated NEAR HOUSE by Supermoon Camp is set to bring together some of the most exceptional builders and founders from the Near ecosystem for an unforgettable 8-day experience. The motto “Stay Together, Build Together” sets the tone for a unique opportunity to foster collaboration and drive impact within Web3 and Open Web.The 20 carefully selected builders and founders will spend 8 days in Denver with Supermoon Camp, engaging in thought-provoking discussions, hands-on building sessions, and hacking activities all while enjoying luxurious accommodations at a private residence.Each day will kick off with a Builders Breakfast, where founders & builders will have the chance to engage in team building activities and enthusiastic discussions about Near Protocol. The curated ETH Denver agenda will provide the builders and founders with a chance to maximize their experience at the event. In-depth brainstorming sessions will be held to explore growth and adoption strategies for the Near ecosystem....

comments.author: S3cco
comments.body: Near House by Supermoon Drives Collaboration Between Near Protocol builders During ETH Denver https://bitcoingarden.org/near-house-by-supermoon-drives-collaboration-between-near-protocol...Supermoon Camp successfully organized Near House ETH Denver, bringing together 20 selected builders and founders from the Near ecosystem for an 8-day “Stay Together, Build Together” experience. Near House ETH Denver included a curated experience with a range of activities, from Supermoon discussion sessions to builders’ breakfasts, alongside collaborative hacking activities where builders gained in-depth knowledge of Near.Social, Mintbase dev tooling and AffiliateDirect, and other Near-based tools. The main goal was to help builders to establish personal relationships and trust that facilitates future collaboration and contributes towards the growth of the Near ecosystem. The curated ETH Denver agenda also included the Near Day mini summit on March 2nd sharing the latest protocol and technological advancements from the Near ecosystem and announcing the BOS, Near’s novel Blockchain Operating System....
